      java.lang.String longOpt,
      java.lang.Object defaultVal,
      java.lang.String comment)
        Option information storrage
        Parameters:
        shortOpt - Short name for the option, e.g., "-p"
        longOpt - Long name for option, e.g., "--port"
        defaultVal - default value: "6633" or null if no default value
        comment - String to print to explain this option, e.g., a help message
